settings.question: Are your ingredients traceable?
settings.answer:
Yes! We believe you should understand what you’re putting in your body and where it comes from. That’s why we made you a handy guide to tell you all about our clean-sourced, traceable ingredients here.

Explore Our Ingredients

settings.question: What kind of testing do you do?
settings.answer:
At Bioligent, our products undergo rigorous testing through trusted third-party labs to meet our high standards for safety and quality. We always make sure to test for: 

  • Ingredient Integrity: We verify that the amount and potency of each ingredient listed on our labels are accurate.

  • Heavy Metals: We screen for harmful contaminants including lead, mercury, and other toxic metals.

  • Product Purity: We check for potential impurities like E. Coli, yeast, and mold, and certify that our ingredients are gluten-free, dairy-free, organic, if applicable, and non-GMO before going into production. 

  • Glyphosates: We ensure that our products are free from harmful pesticides.

settings.question: Are your products gluten-free, dairy-free, or vegan?
settings.answer: Yes! All of our products are gluten-free, dairy-free, non-GMO, and free from common allergens. Check the ingredient section of each product page for full details.

settings.question: Are your supplements safe to take long-term?
settings.answer: Absolutely. Our formulas are designed for daily use and ongoing support. We only use ingredients with a strong safety profile and real science behind them.

settings.question: Can I take more than one Bioligent product at a time?
settings.answer: Yes—in fact, many of our customers do. Each product is formulated to complement your biology and your other supplements. Still, if you're taking medication or have a health condition, we always recommend checking with your practitioner.

settings.question: Can I take your products while pregnant or breastfeeding?
settings.answer: It depends. While our ingredients are clean and well-studied, always consult your healthcare provider before starting any supplement during pregnancy or lactation.

settings.question: Are your products FDA-approved?
settings.answer: Dietary supplements aren’t FDA approved—but they are regulated by the FDA. We comply with all applicable guidelines and go above and beyond with third-party testing, clean labeling, and transparent sourcing.

settings.question: Are your products organic?
settings.answer:
While not certified organic, many of our ingredients are organically grown. What matters most to us is sourcing clean, effective compounds—with full transparency around where they come from and how they’re made.

Explore Our Ingredients

settings.question: Where do you ship?
settings.answer: We currently only ship within the United States. International shipping is not available (yet!).

settings.question: How much does shipping cost?
settings.answer: All Subscribe & Save orders ship free. If you're not using Subscribe & Save, orders over $75 qualify for free shipping. For smaller one-time orders, standard shipping is calculated at checkout based on your location.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Most orders arrive within 3–7 business days. You’ll receive tracking info by email as soon as your package ships.

settings.question: My order arrived damaged—what now?
settings.answer: We’ve got you. If anything arrives broken or compromised, email us at hello@bioligent.com and we’ll make it right.

settings.question: How does my subscription work?
settings.answer:
At Bioligent, we want to eliminate all the guesswork on your end—and that includes figuring out when to order a refill. Once you subscribe to one of our products or bundles, we’ll automatically ship your order every 4, 8, or 12 weeks (you choose the timing). We’ll always notify you a few days beforehand.

Want to push your next supply back a bit or need it quicker? You can rush, skip, or cancel your subscription at any time on your account page.

settings.question: How do I cancel or change my order?
settings.answer: For one-time orders, reach out to us ASAP at hello@bioligent.com. For subscriptions, you can edit your next shipment from your account portal.

settings.question: Can I apply a discount code to a subscription?
settings.answer: Most discount codes only apply to your first order or one-time purchases. If you're using Subscribe & Save, additional discounts won’t stack.

settings.question: Do you offer samples?
settings.answer: Not right now—but with our 30-day money-back guarantee, your first order is totally risk-free.

settings.question: How does the 30-Day Guarantee work?
settings.answer: We want you to love Bioligent as much as we do. But if for any reason, you’re not completely satisfied with your first order, we will happily refund you in full, with proof of purchase within 30 days of delivery. To request a refund, shoot us an email at hello@bioligent.com.

settings.question: Do you offer wholesale pricing?
settings.answer: Yes! We work with licensed health professionals and clinics through our Verified Practitioner Program. If you're a practitioner, apply here to join.

settings.question: Can I sell Bioligent in my clinic or practice?
settings.answer: Yes, absolutely. Just head over to our Exclusive Practitioner Program application here to get started.

settings.question: What does Bioligent mean?
settings.answer: Bioligent = Biology + Intelligent. We build clean, traceable supplements that work with your body, not against it.

settings.question: Why did you start Bioligent?
settings.answer: Our founders, Gina and Janay, were both fed up with feeling off and not getting real answers. Gina was exhausted, foggy, and constantly dismissed by doctors. Janay saw firsthand how confusing and ineffective the supplement world had become. Together, they knew they could build something better: science-backed, transparent, and actually effective.

settings.question: Are your products made in the USA?
settings.answer: Yes—all of our products are manufactured in the U.S. at GMP-certified facilities with strict quality standards.

settings.question: Do your products contain fillers or additives?
settings.answer: Never. No artificial colors, flavors, sweeteners, or synthetic preservatives. Just clean, functional ingredients your body can use.

settings.question: Still have questions?
settings.answer: We always strive to be as transparent as possible. So, if you can’t find the answer to any of your concerns on our website, get in touch with us at hello@bioligent.com.
